about_the_game:
Tiktalec is a monospecific genus of extinct sarcopterygian, at least, that's what you thought!

Tiktalec and Winston are whisked back in time to the moon, where they must stop the Dinosaurs from re-Jurrassifying the Earth in this debut video game adventure based on the zany comic series "Tiktalec and the Time Velocity Couriers"

Find new goo's to increase your power or gain all new abilities, build a winning combo of weapons and powers, and suit up with ridiculous armors.
Managing resources and finding out which powers and weapons compliment each other best will be the key to victory, as new more powerful enemies will start to appear as the game goes on. Some weapons will have advantages and drawbacks, while armors will have either purely defensive capabilities or special bonuses.

Launch into adventure using:
-Velocity powers to slow your enemies.
-Fire extinguishers to chill your cold blooded foes.
-Paper bag lunches to distract dumb dinos.
-Hack computers to find new and bizarre powers
-Ice guns to freeze, electric guns to shock, good old lasers, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 222 MB available space

short_description: Dinosaurs have taken over the Moon! It's up to Tiktalec to stop them!
